apitable_create_record.description: Creates a new record in datasheet.

props.name: recordIds
props.description: The IDs of the records to find.

props.name: fieldNames
props.description: The returned record results are limited to the specified fields

props.name: maxRecords
props.description: How many records are returned in total

props.name: pageSize
props.description: How many records are returned per page (max 1000)

props.name: pageNum
props.description: Specifies the page number of the page

props.name: filter
props.description: The filter to apply to the records (see https://help.aitable.ai/docs/guide/manual-formula-field-overview/)

apitable_update_record.description: Updates an existing record in datasheet.

props.name: recordId
props.description: The ID of the record to update.

new_record.description: Triggers when a new record is added to a datasheet.
